follow_up_questions: Great. What features do you want inside your app?
Do you want login or signup?
Do you want to connect your app with a database?
Should the app have offline mode?
Do you want notifications in your app?
Any specific colours or theme you like?
Do you want the app to support dark mode?
Do you want your app to store user data like profile, name, etc.?
Will your app be available for both Android and iOS?
